description:
Kenshirou visits Musashi in Building 4’s underground cell to ask about his past.
Building 13 invites Musashi to come visit. Uno shows Musashi his new game room.
All the inmates and guards who fought in the New Year’s Tournament gather in the game room. They enjoy each other’s company putting their animosity behind them.
That night, Jyugo can’t sleep still excited from the day’s events. He escapes the cell alone and encounters a certain person...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heya to Billiards to Darts to Watashi
La salle, le billard, les fléchettes et moi
The Room, the Billiards, the Darts, and Me
部屋とビリヤードとダーツと私
